ComicInfo.Summary:
Malcolm Dragon on the force facing his greatest challenge yet.
Note: Includes the back-up comics:
Our Pal Thunder-Head, by Simon Mallette St-Pierre Heck If I Know Comics, by Charlie Higson Hack O'Hara, from Crack Comics, by Erik Larsen. 5 pages. Also includes a back cover pin-up of Stardust The Super Wizard, by Erik Larsen
